artist: Artist: Sakai Yūitsu; Artist: Sakai Hōitsu
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: moon at UL with inserted Tanzaku at R featuring red oni mask and lantern; saves at bottom; trompe l'oeil mount; trompe l'oeil insect painted over roller
inscription: URQ: by Hoitsu: 水無月や　金魚になつて　みたいのふ [Minazuki ya Kingyo ni natte mitainou] (The Sixth month, I wish I would be a golden fish)
markings: LRC in the Tanzaku; LRC painted mount: [Uka]
medium: Ink, colors, and gold on silk
signed: LRC in the Tanzaku: [Hoitsu Giboku]; LRC  painted mount: [Hoshuku]
title: Oni Mask and Moon
